00001 #include <iostream>
00002 #include <ctime>
00003 using namespace std;
00004 
00005 #include <Magick++.h>
00006 using namespace Magick;
00007 
00008 #include "Recognizer.h"
00009 
00013 int main (int argc, char const *argv[])
00014 {
00015     try
00016     {
00017         Image image( argv[1] );
00018         Recognizer recon( image );
00019         
00020         clock_t initialTime, elapsedTime;
00021         double microseconds = 0.0;
00022 
00023         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < 1000; ++i )
00024         {
00025             initialTime = clock();
00026             recon.obtainText();
00027             elapsedTime = clock();
00028             
00029             microseconds = microseconds + ((elapsedTime - initialTime) / 1000.0);
00030         }
00031         std::cout << microseconds / CLOCKS_PER_SEC << std::endl;    
00032 
00033         recon.writeExternalImage(image);
00034         image.write("results.png");
00035     }
00036     catch (std::exception &e)
00037     {
00038         std::cout << e.what() << std::endl;
00039     }
00040     return 0;
00041 }
